item.title: Binding uploaded files to custom class in ASP.NET Core
item.description: The problem I needed to take a file upload (IFormFile) as input in an ASP.NET Core 3 (at the time of writing, version RC1) and pass that to a backend class/processor/api in the form of a custom file class. For purposes of this post, let’s imagine that I have a backend API as follows. public class Processor() { public async Task<bool> ProcessFile(CustomFile file) { // processing magic // more magic return true; } } And the CustomFile class

item.title: Hello world
item.description: Welcome to my new blog, where I’ll be writing mostly about what I learn from programming, finance and life.
